name: Reclamation of the Ancient mines
description:
This is my project for the VR Jam 2022 by Justin P Barnett - VR Dev, immersive insiders, C-Through, Valem · #vrjam2022.
The theme is "One Time Use".

Explore and free the ancient mines from the pesky ghouls !

Assets used:

HurricaneVR

Character Movement Fundamentals

Top Down - Fantasy Forest

Ghoul Crew - Hand Painted !!

FurryS2: Sorceres and Archer

Oriental Sword AnimSet

antique_katana_01_4k

Stylized Slash VFX

Top Down Effects

Sci-Fi Arsenal

Mixamo

Prefab Brush+

Various Sound Libraries

If you have any questions regarding the assets or in generel feel free to ask !

Huge thanks to Justin for letting me submit a bit to late !
